body:
So today is a huge day for me; yes I'm new to Ruqqus. But today also markes 5 years with the Lord Jesus Christ and wow what a whirlwind it was. I don't wanna go into details just because some people might be offended.... but I did come out of being involved in Luciferianism and Satanism... and it took a wonderful woman almost a year of ministry to finally help see the Light of our King...

I have been soo thankful for her; and all that God has done for me. I have been a Christian since March 1, 2016. Thank the Lord... In a few months I'll finish up seminary!

title: Hey Guys!

body:
Did you get body mods? I knew of a satanist 
(he and I were connected vaguely by a few friend circles ) in Portland that had horns implanted in his head,  like silica horns under the skin of his forehead
body_html: Did you get body mods? I knew of a satanist (he and I were connected vaguely by a few friend circles ) in Portland that had horns implanted in his head, like silica horns under the skin of his forehead

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

post.title: Hey Guys!

body: I did not thankfully. I was also blessed enough to not been making enough money for tattoos... I was barely scraping by on my bills. Any money that didn't go to my bills went to alcohol which I was pretty much a drunkard 24/7 for 5  years.

post.title: Hey Guys!

body:
It took a lot of fighting to get off the alcohol. Actually I became a Christian before I got off the alcohol. I still drink but I do not to the extent I used to. Nowadays I drink once or twice a week. God has freed me from many addictions.
- 2 Years Pornography Free
- 4 Years Abstinent ( I used to be hyper-promiscious) thankfully never had gay sex.
- 1 Year Soberish(I still drink 2 times a week)
- 5 Years Withcraft free

God has made my life a much better life.

post.body:
So today is a huge day for me; yes I'm new to Ruqqus. But today also markes 5 years with the Lord Jesus Christ and wow what a whirlwind it was. I don't wanna go into details just because some people might be offended.... but I did come out of being involved in Luciferianism and Satanism... and it took a wonderful woman almost a year of ministry to finally help see the Light of our King...

I have been soo thankful for her; and all that God has done for me. I have been a Christian since March 1, 2016. Thank the Lord... In a few months I'll finish up seminary!

post.title: Hey Guys!

body:
He was probably being too aggressive about it I'll admit that. I'll have a chat with him.

However we do encourage correction and rebuke done in love and humility. 

I do agree that he didn't seem to be talking to you out of love and humility. I'm sorry that happened but all I can say is we are all sinners...  I hope maybe you'll rejoin us. Be blessed brother.
body_html:
